trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for arguments for events dealing with a change in input language.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base para os argumentos para lidar com a uma alteração na linguagem de entrada de eventos.

trans-unit.source: This class provides the base for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs> classes, which in turn provide arguments for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanging> routed events, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe fornece a base para o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs>classes, que por sua vez fornecem argumentos para o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanged>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanging>encaminhados eventos, respetivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes base class values for a new instance of a deriving class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa base valores de classe para uma nova instância de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs> should call this constructor to ensure that values provided by the abstract base class are initialized properly.
trans-unit.target: As classes que derivem de <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs>deve chamar este construtor para se certificar de que os valores fornecidos pela classe base abstrata são inicializados corretamente.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The constructors for <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs> automatically call this base constructor.
trans-unit.target: Os construtores para <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs>chamar automaticamente este construtor base.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing a new current input language.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objeto que representa um novo idioma atual de entrada.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the previous current input language.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objeto que representa o idioma atual da entrada anterior.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the new current input language.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objeto que representa o novo idioma atual de entrada.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is established through the `newLanguageId` parameter provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O valor desta propriedade é estabelecido através de `newLanguageId` parâmetro fornecido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the new current input language.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objeto que representa o novo idioma atual de entrada.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the previous current input language.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objeto que representa o idioma atual da entrada anterior.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is established through the `previousLanguageId` parameter provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O valor desta propriedade é estabelecido através de `previousLanguageId` parâmetro fornecido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the previous current input language.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objeto que representa o idioma atual da entrada anterior.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>
